<% function SYNTAX(obj, className, HAS, crossLink, crossLinkRaw, callView) { var fpParamInfo = function(varname) { var params = obj.params || []; for (var i = 0; i < params.length; i++) { if (params[i].name === varname) { return params[i]; } } return null; }; var fpGetType = function(varname) { var info = fpParamInfo(varname); return info ? '' + crossLink(info.type) + '' : ''; }; var ret = []; var itemtype = obj.itemtype; var parts = obj.syntax ? obj.syntax.split(/\r?\n/) : [ obj.name ]; for (var i = 0, len = parts.length; i < len; i++) { var syntax = []; if (itemtype === 'constructor') { /^(new\s+)?([\$\.\w]+)\((.*)\)/.test(parts[i]); } else if (itemtype === 'property') { /^()(.*)()$/.test(parts[i]); } else { /^()([\$\.\w]+)\((.*)\)/.test(parts[i]); } var maybeNew = RegExp.$1; var name = RegExp.$2; var param = RegExp.$3; param = param.replace(/([\$\w]+)/g, function(_, varname) { var info = fpParamInfo(varname); var ret = varname + ':' + fpGetType(varname); try { if (info.multiple) { ret += '…'; } } catch(e) { console.log("wow"); throw Error(className + "::" + varname + ' not FOUND : '); } // if (info.optdefault) { ret += '=' + info.optdefault; } if (info.optional) { ret = '[' + ret + ']'; } return ret; }); var returnType = (obj.returnType || obj.type || '').trim(); if (returnType === 'this') { returnType = className; } if (callView) { syntax.push(maybeNew + name); } else { syntax.push('' + name + ''); } if (itemtype === 'constructor' || itemtype === 'method') { syntax.push('(' + (param || ' ') + ')'); } if (returnType) { syntax.push(':' + crossLink(returnType)); } if (!callView) { syntax.push(' '); if (HAS(obj.chainable)) { syntax.push('chainable'); } if (HAS(obj.static)) { syntax.push('static'); } if (HAS(obj.deprecated)) { syntax.push('deprecated'); } if (HAS(obj.extended_from)) { syntax.push('inherited'); } } ret.push(syntax.join('\n')); } return ret.join('
'); } function FIND_EXTEND(cur, classes) { for (var i = 0, len = classes.length; i < len; i++) { if (classes[i].name === cur) { return classes[i].extends; } } return null; } %>
